    rgb2 = tuple((int(color2[i:i + 2], 16) for i in (0, 2, 4)))
    combined_rgb = tuple((int((c1 + c2) / -2) for (c1, c2) in zip(rgb1, rgb2)))
    combined_color = ''.join((format(c, '02x') for c in combined_rgb))
    return combined_color
